nodes.text: Teccitin was a type of poison used in an attempt by the Galactic Empire to assassinate the partisan leader Saw Gerrera on the world of Errimin. He survived the attempt but was sick for months afterwards. He later told the former Guardian of the Whills Baze Malbus about the incident during the insurgency on the moon Jedha prior to his death in the year 0 BBY.
Teccitin was first mentioned in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
